entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:26 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -35.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 11:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -35.9°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 67 %

Dewpoint: -39.8°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A few clouds. High minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
